title: Ep 36: Cancer Was Getting On Adam‘s Dad‘s Nerves
itunes:title: Ep 36: Cancer Was Getting On Adam‘s Dad‘s Nerves
description:
Today, this is what's important:

Being mean to Kyle again, Adam's dad's health, how to stay healthy, things the guys did in the past that would get them canceled today, DMX lyrics, how tired Kyle is, more accents, e-bikes, getting vaccinated, dreaming, and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
